definition: Henry Kissinger (1923-), US academic and politician, Secretary of State 1973-1977
base/foundation/basic/radical (chemistry)/(slang) gay

(of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
surname Xin
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: I didn't know who Henry Kissinger was, and I might have asked.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道基辛格是何許人，興許隨口問了。

sentences.english: Take   Kissinger: Would he show up to speak to you alone?
sentences.chinese: 就拿基辛格來說吧，他會爲跟你單獨交談而現身嗎？

sentences.english: But the Kissingers were a Jewish family in a Germany that was on the brink of Nazism.
sentences.chinese: 當時納粹主義正在德國興起，而基辛格一家是猶太人。

sentences.english: But that does not diminish the utility of Kissinger’s thinking the unthinkable.
sentences.chinese: 但是，那並未削弱基辛格所作人所不敢之設想的效果。

sentences.english: But the Kissingers were a Jewish family in a Germany that was on the brink of Nazism .
sentences.chinese: 當時納粹主義正在德國興起，而基辛格一家是猶太人。

sentences.english: Can the Obama team dance as gracefully as Nixon and Kissinger?
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬的團隊能像尼克松和基辛格那樣優雅的跳舞嗎？

sentences.english: Kissinger was so devastated by Rockfeller's defeat that, according to one account, he wept.
sentences.chinese: 基辛格爲洛克菲勒的失敗傷心透了，有人說他哭了。

sentences.english: Kissinger, who matches the definition of a war criminal very accurately, is given a peace prize!
sentences.chinese: 基辛格完全符合戰爭罪犯的定義，卻被授予了和平獎。

sentences.english: American State Secretary Kissinger was the messenger of friendship between China and America.
sentences.chinese: 美國國務卿基辛格是中美關係的友好使者。
